instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1707: What is A1707? A1707 is a model number for a 15 inch size MacBook Pro Retina from years Late 2016, Mid 2017 with EMC 3072, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-00281, 820-00928..
definitions.820-00281: What is 820-00281? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.U6100: What is U6100? this is an SPI ROM chip that holds the BIOS which is necessary for the machine to POST or try and power on..

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1707</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00281</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> can´t install macOS
threads.message: hi, i have one macbook pro <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1707</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> no h2o o board, all looks good , inspection ok , it enter in recovery menu, format disc, and when go install macOS they restarts and get the logo paste ( ?)

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1707</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00281</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> can´t install macOS
threads.message:
Can you boot a preinstalled USB macOS?

You can try known good clean ME BIOS.

i try  boot usb macos and  get apple logo and progress bar status no loading and then gave forbiden logo ..
 how to try good clean me bios ?
